alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 20 at 3:26AM PST until January 22 at 6:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 40 mph possible. * WHERE...San Diego County Valleys and San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...From late Friday night through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty east to northeast winds will continue for Saturday night into Sunday, but are not expected to be as strong as the winds on Saturday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains
